scripts.package: aws cloudformation package --template-file template.yml --output-template-file output.yml --s3-bucket chars-app-repo
scripts.deploy: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file output.yml --stack-name api-lambda-save-dynamodb --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --parameter-overrides TableName=$npm_package_config_table_name
scripts.qd: npm run package && npm run deploy
